duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle customer inquiries, provide information, process bookings, and resolve issues to ensure customer satisfaction.
Communicate with internal and external parties via email and phone to address customer questions and requests.
Interpret tariff rules and footnotes to assist customers with service contract inquiries.
Assist customers in changing the status of their bookings/shipments and provide accurate information using system-generated data.
Process diversions and adjust invoicing as required to reflect value added services and other accessories.
Recognize and resolve customer dissatisfaction effectively, as well as report data and service integrity issues.
